gov.nasa.worldwind.geom.coords

Class DatumTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.geom.coords.DatumTransformation

  • public class DatumTransformation
extends Object
    Class with static methods for datum transformation. Currently shifts between NAD27 and WGS84. Other shifts will be added as needed.
